a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Time spent on personal care, per day, men vs women
Average minutes spent on personal care, per day, by sex (ages 15-65). Personal care activities include: sleeping;
eating and drinking; personal, household, and medical services related to personal care. Estimates come from
time-use surveys and include both weekdays and weekends. The survey years differ across countries. See the
source description for the survey year used for each country.
Minutes spent on personal care - men (15-65)
Minutes spent on personal care - women (15-65)
